lyrics:
If you wanna know
You wounded me 
You wounded me down to the bone
But a little bit 
Just a part of me 
A part of me knows
We don’t wanna fight on
And I 
Know your pain
is the same
And I forgive you
We’re soldiers
We’re soldiers
Armies of one on a battle field
We’re soldiers
And soldiers bleed
Woh oh oh
Before it's 
All over
You'll never be unforgiveable 
You and I we’re soldiers
No victories 
Or apologies
That we’re hurting too much to give
And I
Realize 
Our bitter lies 
Are killing everything that we wanna let live
And I 
Know your pain
is the same
And I forgive you
We’re soldiers
We’re soldiers
Armies of one on a battle field
We’re soldiers
And soldiers bleed
Woh oh oh
Before it's 
All over
You'll never be unforgiveable 
You and I we’re soldiers
And after all that we've been through
We gotta find a way to move on
You and I we're soldiers
We’re soldiers
We’re soldiers
Armies of one on a battle field
We’re soldiers
And soldiers bleed
Woh oh oh
Before it's 
All over
You'll never be unforgiveable 
You and I we’re soldiers
For what it’s worth 
You wounded me
But I forgive you
